text:
Hi <@U05RNDM3VM2> :wave:, I have a clarifying question.

Are you trying to achieve the following?:
• Person 1 engages local development mode (runs `hs project dev`) and tests some changes to an extension in a portal
• Person 2 goes to the same portal on a different computer and sees the changes that person one has made
David, can you tell me why you want to use a remote machine?
HI <@U04HLBUT9QC> is actually person 1 doing both things
Hi <@U03FJQPSC0Y> we work with remote machines in the companies is our usual development workflow
